body: As a free action, the wearer of this ring can gain the ability to magically blend in with her surroundings. This provides a +10 competence bonus on her Stealth checks. As a standard action, she can also use the spell disguise self as often as she wants.
name: Ring of Chameleon Power
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Rings/Ring of Chameleon Power
